TextBody:
ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000LDFzn:ref

Good morning

I would like to know if it is possible to configure the file transfer alerts with specific words in the DLP to receive them by email. If possible I would like to schedule a session for Wednesday March 02nd at 9 am Colombia time (Bogotá time zone (GMT-5)).

I remain attentive to your comments
Thank you
Subject: Netwrix Support Ticket #433975 - Alert configuration

TextBody:
Hello Juan,

That is possible, but did you resolve your email issue yet? 

Thank you,
Zachary Roy
